summary: ACCELERATION PEDAL HARD TO PUSH ACTS LIKE IT STICKS.  THROTTLE BODY WAS CARBONATED UP.  DEALERSHIP CLEANED THROTTLE BODY AND STICKING STOPPED.  THE STICKING USUALLY OCCURRED AT START UP BUT IT ALSO HAPPENED IF YOU REMOVED YOUR FOOT FROM THE GAS PEDAL DURING DRIVING TO SLOW DOWN AND THEN REAPPLIED YOUR FOOT TO ACCELERATE.  I PUT UP WITH THIS FOR ABOUT TWO MONTHS BEFORE I HAD IT SERVICED. TS
